pages.text: These thick, sentient vines can block the paths of any creature that attempts to go through.
When summoned or planted underwater, instead of growing into vines, they grow into aquatic kelp instead.
Monstrous and poisonous, these floral creatures shoot poisonous quills towards their master's foes.
Much like their simple cousins, summoning these poisonous plants underwater will spawn an aquatic variant, though unlike their landlubber counterparts, their quills are unaffected by water.
These plants can be healed using Bone Meal on them. If they're already fully healed, they have a chance of generating a new seed instead.
